document.full_text: a new york judge rejected morgan stanley's  bid to throw out a lawsuit accusing the bank of fraudulently inducing bond insurer mbia inc  to insure $223.2 million of risky mortgage debt.
document.title: morgan stanley loses bid to toss mbia lawsuit
lines_and_colors: a new york judge rejected morgan stanley's  bid to throw out a lawsuit accusing the bank of fraudulently inducing bond insurer mbia inc  to insure $223.2 million of risky mortgage debt.
